tool_description: Maps incident locations to identify high-risk areas and spatial patterns in workplace safety events.

dataset_id.description: Identifier for the classified incident dataset

location_type.description: Type of location data: building, floor, department, or coordinates

risk_threshold.description: Risk score threshold for high-risk area identification (0.0-10.0)

error_messages: Dataset not found: Ensure dataset_id refers to a valid classified dataset.
Invalid location type: Use building, floor, department, or coordinates.
Missing location data: Dataset lacks sufficient location information for mapping.
Invalid risk threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 10.0.
usage: Provide dataset_id and location_type. Adjust risk_threshold to define high-risk areas. The tool creates risk maps and identifies hazardous locations.

high_risk_locations.description: List of locations exceeding the risk threshold

location_risk_scores.description: Risk scores for each analyzed location

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of incidents with valid location data
